name: Mashgin
headline: Self-Checkout using Computer Vision.
description:
Mashgin creates better retail experiences through visual automation. 

We’ve built a self-checkout kiosk that uses computer vision to scan multiple items without barcodes, reducing checkout time by 10x. We’re completely recreating the checkout experience in an industry that’s had little innovation in decades.

Our clients see dramatic reductions in lines and revenue increases of as much as 400% as a result.
tags: industry:cashierless-checkout; industry:deep-learning; industry:hardware; industry:computer-vision; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

# The World's FastestAI-Powered Checkout
Mashgin uses computer vision to make checkout simple and fast. Just put items down and everything rings up automatically.
[Contact Us](http://mashgin.com/</contact>)
![Circle K Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603557fca6b5097977fbac59/6716b580c712f6222e1198aa_Circle-K-home.png)![San Francisco Giants Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603557fca6b5097977fbac59/6716b5bc18b4017cbec1eea8_SF-Giants-home.png)![Kansas City Chiefs Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603557fca6b5097977fbac59/6716b5a99a2b77a734d426ee_KC-Chiefs-home.png)![Aramark Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603557fca6b5097977fbac59/6716b5d0463afcdd265dc907_Aramark-Logo-home.png)![Chestnut Market logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603557fca6b5097977fbac59/66fc3edd31d6be1d67acb963_logo-medium.png.webp)![Levy logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603557fca6b5097977fbac59/6716b5e2edc2dcdc2adaffc1_Levy-Logo-Red-home.png)![Delek US logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603557fca6b5097977fbac59/6716b60b120ecb0042eea76c_delek-us-home.png)![University of Texas at Austin logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603557fca6b5097977fbac59/6716b61c64b9b957b1e778f1_ut-austin-home.png)![bp and ampm logos](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603557fca6b5097977fbac59/6716b5f8e2c02ccece89b93b_ampm%2Bbp-home.png)
## Mashgin is Everywhere
We improve the checkout experience for millions of customers every day across dozens of industries.
40M
### Monthly Mashgin Users
4,000
### Locations & Growing
4X
### Faster Checkout
[See Case Studies](http://mashgin.com/</content/mashgin-case-studies>)
#### Feels Like Magic
Incredible customer experience made real by our insanely powerful computer vision technology.We can use each item's shape, size, color, texture, and specular reflection for instant identification.
#### Easy to Operate
Learns new items in seconds. AI algorithms that improve with every transaction.With 800+ million transactions and counting, our algorithm has the leading edge in reliable and consistent item identification.
![An Ohio University mom buys three huge popcorn boxes and sodas with Mashgin](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603557fca6b5097977fbac59/671ad649485a15960df3caa0_home-easy-operate.jpg)
#### Immediate Results
Happier customers, shorter lines, more efficient staff. No compromises.
### Amaze Your Guests
[Convenience Stores](http://mashgin.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Stadiums](http://mashgin.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Cafe Dining](http://mashgin.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Higher Education](http://mashgin.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[Healthcare](http://mashgin.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)[Grab & Go](http://mashgin.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-5>)
#### Shorter Lines, Bigger Profits
Delek US shortened lines by 67%. Find out how you can do the same.
[Learn More](http://mashgin.com/</industry/convenience-stores>)
#### Short Lines, Happy Fans
University of Texas at Austin boosted stand revenue 125%. Find out how you can do the same.
[Learn More](http://mashgin.com/</industry/sports-entertainment-venues>)
#### Drive Down Lines,Drive Up Revenue
Beat the mealtime crush by keeping lines moving and customers happy.
[Learn How](http://mashgin.com/</industry/cafes-business-dining>)
![Miami University student giving a thumbs up by a Mashgin checkout kiosk.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603557fca6b5097977fbac59/67180a2b4b04dee7efc8647b_campus-dining-student-thumbs-up.jpg)
#### Faster Checkout,Happier Students
Find out why more and more university campuses feature Mashgin.
[Learn More](http://mashgin.com/</industry/higher-education>)
#### Faster Checkout, Happier Staff & Guests
Free up staff to focus on more critical tasks while reducing time spent at checkout. It's a win-win.
[Learn More](http://mashgin.com/</industry/healthcare>)
#### Less Lines, More Volume
Trusted by the best, Mashgin's faster checkout helps grab-and-go spots move more customers in less time.
[Learn How](http://mashgin.com/</industry/mini-markets-grab-n-go>)
![Erick checks out at ampm via Mashgin kiosk](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603557fca6b5097977fbac59/6716cdaabaeec5b30f36edf8_mashgin-cstore-ampm.jpg)
"This technology has reduced checkout times by 67 percent and resulted in an exceptionally high customer adoption rate for the retailer."
Convenience Store News
![Fans check out at the Adelaide Oval with Mashgin](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603557fca6b5097977fbac59/671c02f83460b46b94cf29d4_quote-2-image-adelaide-oval.jpg)
"Fans ... checked out in an average time of 12.5 seconds while revenue at the six stands using Mashgin increased by 125%."
Sports Business Journal
![A Mashgin kiosk sits within a student grab & go area](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/603557fca6b5097977fbac59/664e63dcbba52a9d5002fd90_Healthcare-Hero-2.jpg)
"The self-checkout system delivers a multitude of benefits, including 34% more revenue generated and higher customer satisfaction."
Metz Culinary Management

generated_description:
### Mashgin: Reinventing the Checkout Experience

**Company Overview**
Founded in 2014 and part of Y Combinator's W15 batch, Mashgin is based in Palo Alto, California. The small but powerful team of 75 is on a mission to turn self-checkout into a seamless experience using cutting-edge computer vision technology.

**The Problem They Solve**
If you've ever stood in a long line at a grocery store, you know there hasn't been much innovation in checkout processes in decades. Mashgin is tackling this issue head-on. Their self-checkout kiosks are designed to scan multiple items at once—without the need for pesky barcodes—dramatically reducing checkout times by an impressive 10x. This means happy customers and minimized waiting, which is a win-win for both businesses and patrons.

**Results and Impact**
What’s more, businesses that deploy Mashgin's technology are seeing some serious results—up to a 400% increase in revenue and a 67% reduction in lines. The sheer efficiency and speed have made Mashgin's kiosks extremely popular, with over 40 million users visiting 4,000 locations monthly.

**Technology at Play**
Mashgin's kiosks utilize an advanced form of artificial intelligence characterized by deep learning techniques and sophisticated computer vision. The technology analyzes each item’s shape, color, size, and texture, making it incredibly efficient in identifying items and ringing them up automatically. With over 800 million transactions processed, their A.I. is constantly learning and improving.

**Industries Served**
Mashgin isn't just a one-trick pony. Their kiosks are making waves across various sectors, including:
- Convenience Stores
- Stadiums
- Cafes & Business Dining
- Higher Education
- Healthcare
- Ski Resorts

**Key Partnerships**
Mashgin has established connections with leading names such as Delek US and the University of Texas at Austin, solidifying their place in the self-checkout market.

**Conclusion**
In a world where retail is increasingly demanding faster and more efficient solutions, Mashgin is riding the wave of innovation with a clear vision: create better retail experiences through visual automation. If you want to know more, check out their [website](http://mashgin.com).
